title: SMB - PackML
description: Represent a PackML state of an ISA S88 object

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be PackML

oldstate.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Numeric value of the old PackML State

newstate.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Numeric value of the new PackML State

stateChangeTime.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. Date and time of this observation represented by an ISO8601 UTC format.

oldname.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Name of the old PackML State

newname.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Name of the new PackML State

treepath.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Name of the treepath of the object
